title: Case-Based Online Business Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental business operations knowledge and online platform usage experience
context.additional_context: Case analysis-centered education for solving problems encountered in real work environments by professionals

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose core issues in real business cases from three or more perspectives.
Learners can propose actionable solutions reflecting peer feedback in case-based discussions.
Learners can utilize digital tools to create visual reports (infographics, dashboards, etc.) of case study results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
